original_text:
Gilead stayed beyond the Jordan;
    and Dan, why did he stay with the ships?
Asher sat still at the coast of the sea,
    staying by his landings.
korean_text: 길르앗은 요단 강 저쪽에 거주하며 단은 배에 머무름이 어찌 됨이냐 아셀은 해변에 앉으며 자기 항만에 거주하도다

sentences.original_text: and Dan, why did he stay with the ships?
Asher sat still at the coast of the sea,
